Apple___Apple_scab.description: Apple scab is caused by the fungus Venturia inaequalis. It affects leaves and fruits. Control it with fungicides and resistant varieties.

Apple___Black_rot.description: Black rot affects apples, causing fruit rot and leaf spot. Prune infected branches and apply fungicide.

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.description: A fungal disease with orange spots on leaves. Remove nearby cedar trees and apply fungicides.

Potato___Early_blight.description: Early blight causes brown leaf spots. Practice crop rotation and apply fungicides early.

Potato___Late_blight.description: Late blight causes leaf lesions and tuber rot. Use resistant varieties and copper-based fungicides.

Tomato___Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial spot leads to black lesions on leaves and fruit. Use clean seeds and copper sprays.

Tomato___Early_blight.description: Causes target-shaped leaf spots. Remove infected debris and apply preventive sprays.

Tomato___Late_blight.description: A devastating disease causing wilting and fruit rot. Use resistant varieties and regular fungicide sprays.

Tomato___Leaf_Mold.description: Yellow spots on leaves that turn moldy. Improve air circulation and treat with sulfur sprays.

Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.description: Transmitted by whiteflies, this virus curls and yellows leaves. Use resistant varieties and control whiteflies.

Tomato___healthy.description: Your tomato plant is healthy! Keep monitoring for any early signs of disease.

Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_.description: Rust appears as reddish pustules on leaves. Rotate crops and use resistant hybrids.

Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight.description: Causes long, gray-green lesions. Apply fungicides and avoid continuous cropping.

Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening).description: A bacterial disease spread by psyllids. Use certified planting material and remove infected trees.

Peach___Bacterial_spot.description: Causes lesions on fruit and leaves. Apply copper sprays and manage orchard sanitation.

Strawberry___Leaf_scorch.description: Dark spots form on leaves, leading to drying. Improve airflow and remove infected foliage.
